title: MASSIVE ORC SIEGE BATTLE: GONDOR'S LAST STAND - Third Age Total War Reforged Mod Gameplay
description:
MASSIVE ORC SIEGE BATTLE - Third Age Total War Reforged Mod Gameplay - Hey guys! Welcome back to another reforged battle replay. This is a custom scenario made by Horton. It's a 3v5 and the orc have to attack in waves! Enjoy the Battle :D


JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
